wheat flour.description: Basic flour made from wheat grains, commonly used in baking

water.description: Essential for life and food processing

salt.description: Essential mineral but should be consumed in moderation
salt.warning: High sodium content - limit consumption if you have high blood pressure

sugar.description: Added sweetener that can contribute to health issues when consumed excessively
sugar.warning: High sugar intake linked to obesity, diabetes, and dental problems

palm oil.description: Saturated fat that may raise cholesterol levels
palm oil.warning: High in saturated fat - consume in moderation

trans fats.description: Artificially created fats that significantly increase heart disease risk
trans fats.warning: Avoid completely - linked to heart disease and stroke

partially hydrogenated oil.description: Contains trans fats which are harmful to cardiovascular health

monosodium glutamate.description: Flavor enhancer that may cause sensitivity reactions in some people
monosodium glutamate.warning: May cause headaches or nausea in sensitive individuals

high fructose corn syrup.description: Sweetener linked to obesity, diabetes, and metabolic disorders
high fructose corn syrup.warning: Associated with weight gain and increased diabetes risk

e102.description: Tartrazine - artificial yellow coloring linked to hyperactivity in children
e102.warning: May cause hyperactivity in children and allergic reactions

e110.description: Sunset Yellow - artificial coloring with potential health concerns
e110.warning: May cause hyperactivity and allergic reactions

e122.warning: May cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals

e211.description: Sodium Benzoate - preservative that may form harmful compounds
e211.warning: Can form benzene when combined with vitamin C

e223.description: Sodium Metabisulfite - preservative that may cause allergic reactions
e223.warning: May cause allergic reactions, especially in asthmatics

e320.description: BHA (Butylated Hydroxyanisole) - antioxidant with potential carcinogenic effects

e321.description: BHT (Butylated Hydroxytoluene) - antioxidant with health concerns
e321.warning: Potential health risks with regular consumption

aspartame.description: Artificial sweetener with potential side effects
aspartame.warning: May cause headaches and other symptoms in sensitive individuals

sodium nitrite.description: Preservative that can form harmful compounds when heated
sodium nitrite.warning: Can form nitrosamines (potential carcinogens) when cooked

sodium nitrate.description: Preservative with similar concerns to sodium nitrite
sodium nitrate.warning: Can convert to nitrite and form harmful compounds

corn syrup.description: Sweetener that can contribute to health issues when consumed excessively
corn syrup.warning: High sugar content - consume in moderation

artificial flavoring.description: Synthetic compounds used to enhance flavor
artificial flavoring.warning: Some artificial flavors may cause allergic reactions

citric acid.description: Natural acid found in citrus fruits, commonly used as preservative

vinegar.description: Acetic acid solution used for flavoring and preservation

vegetable oil.description: Plant-based oil that varies in health impact depending on type
vegetable oil.warning: Choose healthier options like olive or avocado oil when possible

sunflower oil.description: Relatively healthy plant oil rich in vitamin E

coconut oil.description: High in saturated fat but may have some health benefits
coconut oil.warning: High in saturated fat - use in moderation

yeast.description: Microorganism used for fermentation and leavening

lecithin.description: Natural emulsifier found in eggs and soybeans

gellan gum.description: Natural thickening agent produced by bacteria

guar gum.description: Natural thickening agent from guar beans

carrageenan.description: Seaweed extract used as thickener - some health concerns debated
carrageenan.warning: Some studies suggest potential digestive issues

potassium sorbate.description: Preservative generally considered safe but may cause reactions
potassium sorbate.warning: May cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals

calcium propionate.description: Mold inhibitor commonly used in bread
calcium propionate.warning: Some reports of behavioral effects in children

sodium bicarbonate.description: Baking soda - safe when used appropriately

rice flour.description: Gluten-free flour alternative made from rice

oat flour.description: Nutritious flour made from ground oats

cocoa powder.description: Natural powder from cocoa beans rich in antioxidants

honey.description: Natural sweetener with some beneficial properties

maple syrup.description: Natural sweetener but still high in sugar
maple syrup.warning: High sugar content - use in moderation

stevia.description: Natural zero-calorie sweetener from stevia plant

erythritol.description: Sugar alcohol with minimal calories and blood sugar impact

sorbitol.description: Sugar alcohol that may cause digestive issues in large amounts
sorbitol.warning: May cause digestive discomfort when consumed in large quantities

mannitol.description: Sugar alcohol with potential laxative effects
mannitol.warning: May cause digestive issues in sensitive individuals

sucralose.warning: Some concerns about gut bacteria effects with regular use

acesulfame potassium.description: Artificial sweetener with some health debate
acesulfame potassium.warning: Some studies suggest potential health concerns

safe.description: Ingredients that are generally safe for regular consumption

moderate.description: Ingredients that may have health concerns when consumed regularly

highConcern.description: Ingredients that pose significant health risks and should be avoided or consumed rarely
